summary: A well-to-do Sydney party disintegrates into chaos and panic when a bomb goes off forcing 5 friends into a 1960's nuclear shelter. As food and water runs out they are forced to make an impossible decision - either one dies or they all die.

keywords: survival|australian science fiction|post apocalypse|low budget film|australian
title: 54 Days
